original_definition: 'buying Member State' means a Member State that enters into a statistical transfer agreement to buy a certain statistical quantity of renewable energy from another Member State which is added to the amount of energy from renewable sources that is taken into account in calculating the former Member State’s renewable energy share pursuant to Article 8(1) of Directive (EU) 2018/2001;

Article\u00a02: ‘buying Member State’ means a Member State that enters into astatistical transferagreement to buy a certain statistical quantity ofrenewable energyfrom another Member State which is added to the amount ofenergy from renewable sources that is taken into account in calculating the former Member State’s renewable energy share pursuant to Article 8(1) of Directive (EU) 2018/2001;

‘buying Member State’ means a Member State that enters into a statistical transfer agreement to buy a certain statistical quantity of renewable energy from another Member State which is added to the amount of energy from renewable sources that is taken into account in calculating the former Member State’s renewable energy share pursuant to Article 8(1) of Directive (EU) 2018/2001;
